channel.title: arcpy on steeeeps
channel.description: Recent content in arcpy on steeeeps

item.title: Undefined-variable-from-import-BuildPyramidsAndStatistics_management
item.description: 使用arcpy.BuildPyramidsAndStatistics_management ()构建栅格数据金字塔和做统计值时，提示该方法为定义: Undefined variable from import: BuildPyramidsAndStatistics_management. 查看arcpy源码发现，时帮助文档中单词拼写出现了问题，正确的写法应该是: arcpy.BuildPyramidsandStatistics_management()
